description:
Have a little fun with your commute. Built for every corner of the urban world, Cannondale’s Quick CX line moves from dirt trails to bike lanes without a hiccup. Its relaxed geometry lets you keep your head up in the city, and you can add on fenders to make this an all-season riding machine. Outfitted with a versatile microSHIFT drivetrain you can cruise up hills, hit trails, and find the perfect smile-inducing speed on your way home.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame and Suntour NEX suspension fork, with relaxed riding geometry
  • 3x7 drive train pairs 48-28T chain rings with a 14-34T cassette, helping smooth out the hills
  • microSHIFT components, with an alloy Prowheel crank
  • Promax mechanical disc brakes keep your speed in check
  • Double-wall alloy rims
  • 700x40c Vitttoria tires have a reflective strip to help keep you seen
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Quick CX 4 Bicycle - Unisex
